captions.text: Like a habit that I can't cut off
I barely leaned myself on the cold wall
Even though I pretend that I'm not
That won't even get to you
Can you hear my heart my heart
You're the only one I need
Through the gap where the light's coming out
I knew I couldn't hide it even though I try
After few minutes that felt like a year to me
Can you hear my heart my heart
You're the only one I need
You're the only one for me (You-u-ooh)
I'm still who I used to be (You-u-ooh)
Just like the story that has already been made
Just like the lie that's deep in heart
Can you hear my heart my heart
You're the only one I need
Like the dream from last night (You-u-ooh)

everything. <3 John Park﻿
